main event: A witness observed a UFO in Barstow, California on June 30, 1967, describing it as having a color that varied from dull orange to bright red and moving with distinct changes in direction.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 3 minutes,The UFO was observed moving northwest,The object's motion included distinct right angle turns,The object was believed to be related to the star Arcturus,The witness was located on a desert road near the city and reported that the object moved at a very fast, constant speed.
witness description: The witness was outdoors near a desert road.
